## LiveSelector.reverse() method

Reverses the elements in an Array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reverse(): LiveSelector<T, SingleMode>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`LiveSelector<T, SingleMode>`

## Example


```ts
ls.reverse()

```
